text: Ara tadera upara yakhana kona ayaba pare takhana bale, he musa amadera jan'ya tomara para'oyaradegarera nikata se bisaye doya kara ya tini tomara sathe oyada kare rekhechena. Yadi tumi amadera upara theke e ayaba sariye da'o, tabe abasya'i amara imana anaba tomara upara ebam tomara sathe bani-isara'iladerake yete deba.
